item.title: Of Nightmares and Button-Clicks
item.description: I had a seemingly simple task of fixing a submit button that was allowing multiple submissions on one of our ASP.NET Web Forms sites. Getting the client and server to agree on when to disable the button proved problematic. I spent a few hours combined with a couple of more experienced developers on our team, and even tried to implement a similar solution from one of our other sites. I was stumped.
